entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:07 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 10:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 76 %

Wind: ESE 11 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
